title: Gridinsoft Anti-Malware 3.0.28 + Patch
description:
Cure your PC from any kind of Malware! Be sure that your computer will be saved from a Virus-Attack and stay protected from Virus threats!



Gridinsoft Anti-Malware is the modern powerful solution that keeps rendering assistance to thousands of the Windows users to get rid of the malicious software. It does it's job quikly and effectivlwey. You do not to spend hopurs manually cleaning your PC  from "Unwanted Guests".



Eliminates any sneakiest malware with ease. Gridinsoft Anti-Malware helps in diofficult cases where well-known and complicated anti-virus products get stuck.



Windows users who want to further customaze Anti-Malware's behavioral pattern may tinker with settings surrounding exclusions, rootkits, archives and advanced heuristics. It is possible to enable and examine scan logs, resort to a proxy server for virus database updates, disable notifications, integrtade the app into the Windows Expliorer contect menu for quick scanning, and so on. Ityems sent to the quarantine can be examined before deciding wheter to keep or delete them.



The most recent tests have shown that Gridinsoft Anti-Malware delivers very good results when it comes to virus detection. It's main downside, however, is that it frequently hangs during various operations (such as scanning or verifying the latest virus signatures) and it is generally very slow when it comes to removing the infected files.



To conclude, there are two sides to Gridinsoft Anti-Malware's story: hardcore PC users who offten travel to the dark siode of the internet are better off with faster and more stable utilities. However, by pairing it up with a reliable Third-Party real-guard, the program can become quite handy to casual users who want to double-check.



Gridinsoft have 58794 downloads, 5478020 killed viruses, 12 years of experience and 24/7 effective support service
